sentences: Oleksime meie eest koos tööd teinud.
Kui oleksime varajasemalt lahkunud, oleksid me saavutanud.
Tuleksime meile appi kui oleksime vajadusel.
context: Oleksime is the first-person plural conditional form of Estonian verb 'olema' (to be). It means 'we would be' or 'we would have been'. This conditional mood expresses a hypothetical situation or possibility that depends on certain conditions. In Estonian grammar, this form follows the pattern where the stem 'ol-' plus '-ksime' creates the first-person plural conditional form.
